name: Roronoa Zoro
effect: [Rush] This character can attack on the turn it is played.

name: Roronoa Zoro
effect: [Duel] When this character attacks a character with 3000 or less power, it gains +1000 power during this turn.

name: Nami
effect: [Search] When played, search your deck for a card with the same name and add it to your hand.

name: Usopp
effect: [Shield] When this character is attacked, you may discard a card to reduce the damage by 1000.

name: Sanji
effect: [Strike] This character gains +1000 power during your turn.

name: Tony Tony Chopper
effect: [Support] Gives +1000 power to a friendly character.

name: Nico Robin
effect: [Trigger] When played, draw a card.

name: Franky
effect: [Blocker] This character can stop any attack on a character with power less than this card's.

name: Brook
effect: [Revive] When this character is KO'd, you can return it to the deck instead of the trash.

name: Jinbe
effect: [Blocker] This character can stop attacks from characters with a power of 5000 or more.

name: Zoro's Sword
effect: [Action] Equip Zoro with this card. When equipped, Zoro gains +2000 power for the rest of the turn.

name: Luffy's Straw Hat
effect: [Action] Luffy gains +1000 power until the end of the turn.

name: Nami's Climatact
effect: [Action] Nami gains +2000 power for the turn and allows you to draw 1 card.

name: Usopp's Slingshot
effect: [Action] Usopp gains +3000 power and allows you to deal 1 damage to an opponent’s character.

name: Sanji's Diable Jambe
effect: [Action] Sanji gains +4000 power for the turn.

effect: [Action] Chopper gains +5000 power for the turn.

name: Franky's Super
effect: [Action] Franky gains +6000 power and deals 1 damage to all opponent’s characters.

name: Brook's Soul King
effect: [Action] Brook gains +3000 power, and you draw a card.

name: Jinbe's Fish-Man Karate
